## Events.EmailBounceEvent.message property

The bounce types are the following: - `BOUNCE` (a hard bounce) - `COMPLAINT` (a soft bounce) - `OOTO` (out-of-the-office) - `UNKNOWN`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly message: 'BOUNCE' | 'COMPLAINT' | 'OOTO' | 'UNKNOWN';
```
